DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select Rol.RoleId as [Role ID], Rol.RoleCode as [Role Code], Rol.RoleName as [Role Name], Acc.AccountId as [Account ID], UserLogin.UserName as [Account Username], UserEmail.UserName as [Account Username (email)], Acc.DisplayName as [Account Name] from tbRole Rol left join tbAccount2Role Acc2Role on Acc2Role.RoleId=Rol.RoleId left join tbAccount Acc on Acc.AccountId=Acc2Role.AccountId left join tbLoginAlias UserLogin on UserLogin.AccountId=Acc.AccountId and UserLogin.PrimaryAlias=1 left join tbLoginAlias UserEmail on UserEmail.AccountId=Acc.AccountId and UserEmail.LoginAliasType=1 order by Rol.RoleName, UserLogin.UserName, Acc.DisplayName

RichDescItem.Description:
Roles Report

Abstract

“Roles” generates a report of all the role profile details of all the accredited users.

Generating the report

The program features intuitive interface.

Parameter Input
No parameter required.
 
Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] -Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]

Contents (by Columns)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Role ID] – Role ID (unique identifier - format i.e. '015742B4-6C49-4179-8A42-52D9B884EBD5')        
  • [Role Code] – Role Code  (i.e. format 'ADM')  
  • [Role Name] – Role Name (i.e. self explanatory i.e. 'Administartor')
  • [Account ID] - Account ID (unique identifier - format ie. '741142D6-1887-69AC-000D-0157BEBCFE9C')
  • [Account Username] – Account username
  • [Account Username (email)] – Account Login Mail Address
  • [Account Name] - Account Name. Display format “Last Name”, “First Name”
